headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://use.fontawesome.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https://images.unsplash.com https://www.dashify.com.au https://media.licdn.com https://felixstatic.s3.amazonaws.com https://felixstatic.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com; connect-src 'self' https://www.google-analytics.com https://region1.google-analytics.com https://*.google-analytics.com; frame-ancestors 'none';
